Body:
"""
        Test that a Pie private key can be converted into a core private key.
        """
pie_key = pobjects.PrivateKey(enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, 2048, self.
    private_bytes, enums.KeyFormatType.PKCS_8)
core_key = self.factory.convert(pie_key)
self.assertIsInstance(core_key, secrets.PrivateKey)
self._test_core_key(core_key, enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, 2048, self.
    private_bytes, enums.KeyFormatType.PKCS_8)
